english: Rather than speaking of love on the far side of the moon,
I want to look into your eyes and bask in the light even more.
Rather than hiding, I want to be honest.
Right now, I truly want to be my real self.
Please, see me more.
Each day rushes by as if being swept along (we keep passing by each other).
A little bit of anxiety makes my heart waver (what are you looking at?).
Are there really things that can't be changed? Ya!
The pain of youth, the confusion born from inexperience.
But I swore—I won't just go with the flow anymore.
I want to reach the sky I long for—Staying like this isn't enough.
More, more, more—I want to shine even brighter.
I want to seize it—the continuation of this dream, and I want it to be with you.
If it's just for myself, it means nothing.
I want to deliver my Goodness, and I'll never forget my Kindness,
Because you're right beside me…
The wind stops, and I gaze at the swaying flowers (suddenly, I realize).
I felt like I heard someone say goodbye—why? (Being alone…)
Something feels off—I tremble in the night, No...
The pain of lying, the struggle to accept my own inexperience.
But you already knew—being forgiven so easily isn't the way.
I want to catch up, I don’t want to lose—this feeling is too strong.
Even if I’m clumsy, even if I push myself too hard, there’s something I can’t give up.
Reckless, impulsive—I’ll fire my empty shots into the sky,
Let my heart’s cry resonate.
Don't get it wrong, Justness—I will become stronger, Hardness
With a love beyond mere words.

I want to look into your eyes and bask in the light even more.

Right now, I truly want to be my real self.

I want to seize it—the continuation of this dream, and I want it to be with you.
If it's just for myself, it means nothing.
I want to deliver my Goodness, and I'll never forget my Kindness,
Because you're right beside me…

Don't get it wrong, Justness—I will become stronger, Hardness
I want to deliver my Goodness, and I'll never forget my Kindness

english: **Only one**—a love I can't put into words, **"Be with you"**
Even now, I'm still in this beautiful dream.
On that afternoon when you smiled, the wind changed colors.
It was nothing special, yet somehow extraordinary.
Little moments keep adding up.
Two people, somehow alike, weaving a story together.
If only I could test it out before writing it down…
But hesitation stops my fingers.
**Only one**—a love I can't put into words, **"Be with you"**
Even now, I'm still in this beautiful dream.
You don’t even realize, do you?
I want to reach you, but I can’t.
Trapped inside—**this secret love.**
I've always longed for a situation like this.
Take my hand and call my name.
**Lonely night**—lost among the stars, **"Be with you"**
Show me a dream that will never fade.
No one else can take your place.
You're the only one—just you.
**Only one**—a love I can't put into words, **"Be with you"**
You don’t even realize, do you?
I want to reach you, but I can’t.
Trapped inside—**this secret love.**

Begitu biasa, namun terasa begitu istimewa.
Kenangan kecil yang terus bertambah.
Dua insan yang entah bagaimana serupa, menenun kisah bersama.
Andai saja aku bisa mencobanya lebih dulu sebelum menuliskannya,
Namun keraguan menghentikan jemariku.
**Only one**—tak bisa kuungkapkan dengan suara, "Be with you"
Bahkan kini, aku masih terjebak dalam mimpi yang indah.
Kau mungkin tak menyadarinya, bukan?
Ingin kusampaikan, namun tak bisa.
Cinta rahasia yang terkunci di dalam hati.
Skenario seperti ini, sudah lama aku impikan.
Genggam tanganku, panggil namaku.
**Lonely night**—tersamar di antara bintang, "Be with you"
Tunjukkan padaku mimpi yang tak akan pernah berakhir.
Tak ada yang bisa menggantikanmu,
Hanya ada satu, dan itu adalah dirimu.
**Only one**—tak bisa kuungkapkan dengan suara, "Be with you"

romaji: Namae wo mada motanai chiisana genseki
Hakanaku yureru mirai donna ni mayottemo
Koko wa haruka na tabi no hajimari
Itsu no hi ka dareka no hikari ni naremasu you ni

english: A small gemstone, yet to be named,
A fragile, wavering future—no matter how lost I become.
Don’t let sadness color you,
Let’s find our own colors.
Here, at the beginning of a long journey,
May we someday become someone's guiding light.
With a vow in my heart,
I chase after the footprints of dreams,
Polishing each other as we go,
Further and further, beyond the horizon.
We are not perfect, And that’s why we can become anything.
No matter how irregular our shapes may be,
Let’s hold our heads high and move forward.
Someday, as our paths cross along the way,
Even when we clash,
Our brilliance will only shine brighter.
Beyond the pain we overcome,
There lies a dazzling future waiting for us,
And I believe in it—strongly, deeply.
On this road we continue walking together,
May we always be each other’s light.
With all my heart, I make this wish,
Chasing after the footprints of dreams,
Side by side, step by step,
Endlessly, without limits.
Forever, no matter how far.

english: Come on, follow me with high expectations!
A special stage for the daughters of noble families.
Listen to the song, watch the dance—

Climbing higher and higher,
Worship these days of live performances,

Shining, the stardust Campanella
Because I want to shine brighter than anyone else,
Please don’t stop the music in my heart.

A Campanella cannot ring alone,
With eye contact, we connect.
Ah, I just want to get closer to my dream!
With my one-of-a-kind talent,
I’ll give my all!
Please, support me!
In a place no one sees,
I train hard every day.
I want to show you

Looking into your eyes, waving my hand, smiling—

At my core, I’m an idol.
Standing in the center of the stage, bathed in lights,
I want to be someone
Worthy of this place.
The angel I once admired from above the clouds

And that day, I made a vow.
Ten years from now, my future self
Will return it tenfold, for sure.
I’ll be the one making dreams come true!
I swear, I’m serious about this!
The overflowing dreams of Campanella,
The light may seem so far away,

Shining, the stardust Campanella,
Because I want to shine brighter than anyone else,
Please don’t stop the music in my heart.
Someday, I’ll surely be the brightest star!
A Campanella cannot ring alone,
With call and response,

An idol who keeps her word,
Burning with passion,
Please, give me all your cheers!

Aku bersumpah, aku benar-benar serius!
Campanella yang penuh dengan impian,

Mataku bersinar, menyerap semuanya—

Goodbye

Days swaying like a pendulum
If you say this is the best

Well, I'll go, with my voice

With the pounding of my heart
Thank you
I could have chosen not to notice, but

It was the moment when the seasons began to change
Goodbye

It feels like it's from me, but
I also knew the things you decided
Because we both became stronger
Was it the best goodbye?
Goodbye
It's enough now
